TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TFSessionOptions extends TensorFlow.TFDisposable

Docs.summary: The session options object holds configuration options that you want to use during your session, like the TensorFlow target or the configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetConfig (IntPtr protoData, int length, TensorFlow.TFStatus status = null);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetConfig(native int protoData, int32 length, class TensorFlow.TFStatus status) cil managed

Docs.param: Serialized protocol buffer for the tensorflow.ConfigProto message.
If config was not parsed successfully as a ConfigProto, the error is recorded here.
Docs.summary: Sets the configuration information for the session.
Docs.remarks: The configuration option is a Protocol Buffer representing the tensorflow.ConfigProto

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetTarget(string target) cil managed

Docs.param: target can be empty, a single entry, or a comma separated list of entries. Each entry is in one of the following formats: "local", ip:port, host:port.
